# shinyExams

The goal of shinyExams is to provide a shiny interface for the package [exams](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/exams/index.html).

## Installation

You can install shinyExams from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("flaviobarros/shinyExams")
```
